description:
To leave your hair feeling clean and nourished, weâ€™ve put the good stuff into this plant-based shampoo bar. Chamomile and Australian rosewater lovingly help calm and soothe the scalp, while your purchase goes on to help end global poverty. A good hair day and the ability to change the world? What more could you want!

The how-to
Wet your hair and the shampoo bar, and rub bar in between your hands until you have a lather. Put the bar down and massage shampoo lather into your hair. Rinse, then follow with our life-changing conditioner bar.


Product Features:

  • Calming and Soothing
  • Made in Australia
  • Vegan friendly
  • Not tested on animals
  • Made with recirculated water
  • Made with recycled cardboard
  • Made with no product wastage
name: Thankyou 100G
